description.en:
Reo-chan, a first year girl, gets dumped by her boyfriend because she's not skilled in the home economic traits he believes women should have. Her ex tells her that she must apply to a "housework" club before he will reconsider going out with her. Therefore Reo-chan has little choice but to join.  
  
Here's the catch: the only members are four gorgeous bishies. The other first year in the club, Irinaka, competes with her a lot. As the story progresses Reo and Irinaka get forced into a lot of interesting situations together and in the meantime become closer and closer.

altTitles.ja: らぶきょんLOVEin景福宮

description.en:
Monarchy ended long ago in Korea, but there are still other countries with Kings, Queens, princes and princesses. What if Korea had continued monarchism? What if all the beautiful palaces which are now only historical relics were actually filled with people? What if the glamorous royal family still maintained the palace customs? Welcome to a world where Korea still has the royal family living their lives! But for Che-Kyung, a high-school girl, this is a tragedy, since she has to marry the prince who turns out to be a total jerk!  
  
The final volume (Vol. 28) of Goong is a collection of short stories that ranges from the past to the future of the main story.   
(comiXology)

altTitles.ja: PICK ME UP～低レア★英雄の成り上がり～
ピックミーアップ！低レア英雄の成り上がり

altTitles.ja-ro: Pick Me up!! Tei Rea Eiyū No Nariagari

description.en:
1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss' attack patterns.

That was Seojin Han's philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he's got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.

Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?
description.pt-br:
No jogo de gacha mobile famoso por sua extrema dificuldade, o Mestre classificado em 5º lugar no mundo, "Loki" perde a consciência ao invadir a Masmorra.

"O quê? Eu sou um personagem de jogo agora?"

Depois de acordar, "Loki" percebe que ele se transformou em um Herói de Nível 1, 1 Estrela – 'Han Yslat'. Para retornar à Terra, ele deve liderar o Mestre e os heróis novatos e limpar o 100º andar da Masmorra!

"Você mexeu com o cara errado".

Esta é a história de transporte mais difícil  pelo Mestre Loki que nunca aceita uma única derrota.

description.en:
Lee Kyun, the Shepherd, is at the top of the pyramid of the Carnivore Class. Everything was perfect - other than the fact that he has a crush on his best friend, Choi Hae Beom, the Leopard. Too scared to confess, he thought he would be satisfied with just the title of "Best Friend," when a bottom-of-the-food-chain, zero-attack-power Golden Hamster appears and starts to show interest in Hae Beom. Between the two of them, who will manage to capture the Leopard's heart?!

#BL #ShortSeries #Cute #Sweet #SchoolSetting #Hybrids #UnrequitedLove #LoveTriangle #NiceTop #CuteBottom

title.en: Zatsuyou Fuyo Jutsushi ga Jibun no Saikyou ni Kizuku made

altTitles.ja: 雑用付与術師が自分の最強に気付くまで

altTitles.en: Until the Chore Granting Sorcerer Realized That He Is At His Strongest

description.en:
Wimme Strauss is an adjunct sorcerer who provides support and does odd jobs. However, after defeating the master of the hierarchy, he is expelled from the party by the leader, whose pride is hurt. Wimme is at a loss, but his childhood ~~stalker~~friend Heidemarie finds him and recruits him for the biggest party, the Wings of the Dragon.
"It's like a miracle ...... fuhehe."
He claims that his achievement is a coincidence, but it's only a matter of time before everyone around him realizes what he's capable of.

Classroom outcasts Shin-su and Jin-o were forced to eat Physarum Polycephalum because of school bullies.

The two outcasts, who are still bullied and ignored at school, gradually take over the food chain while keeping their identities a secret. However, as the slime traces start to surface one by one, they start to cause social problems, and the fight intensifies when Kim Soo-hyuk, who created a mutated blob experiment, appears.

The Extraordinary Museum is a vast castle suspended in an upside-down subspace. After my sister vanished, I found myself as the sole employee of this place. How can I even begin to describe this feeling? Watching over the world's greatest collection of treasures, I must admit, is a bit overwhelming.

altTitles.ja: 不滅のあなたへ

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en: For Haei, being able to go to school with her idol, Ijy, is a dream come true! Plus she gets to help him with rehearsing. But with the girls from his fan club, who make her life hell on earth. But then Eo, a kid in primary school, wants her to pretend to be his girlfriend, making it easier for him to get away from his groupies. Haei's life isn't done being complicated….

description.en:
On that day, humanity was turned into “prey”―Gen is a high school student living on the island of Tsushima, a door to mainland Japan.

Along with his sickly sister, Misaki, and his heartwarming mother, Gen was living a peaceful life, all until an “asymmetrical monster” appears on the island. All hell breaks loose on the island of Tsushima.

These monsters devour everything from plants to animals, to humans, and mutate together. Will humanity stand a chance against these mutant creatures? Is there any hope?
description.uk:
Того дня людство було перетворено на «здобич».
Ґен — старшокласник, який живе на острові Цушіма, що є дверима до материкової Японії.
Разом зі своєю хворобливою сестрою Місакі та чарівною матір'ю Ґен жив мирним життям, поки на острові не з'явився «асиметричний монстр».

Після цього на острові Цушіма починається пекло.

Ці монстри пожирають все, від рослин до тварин і людей. Після цього мутують.
Чи матиме людство шанс протистояти цим істотам-мутантам?
Є якась надія?

Gal na Najimi wa Koko ga Suki

My Gyaru Childhood Friend Loves it Here

description.en: Hiro, a high school boy living in the countryside, is walking along the beach one day when he is approached by a black gal who looks like she belongs in Shibuya. He is surprized to find out that she's Rio, his childhood friend who he used to play with in the old days! An explosive reunion × countryside × sea romcom with heart-throbbing situations, delivered in a double feature!!
description.pt-br: Voltando para a cidade natal, um encontro inesperado com um amigo de infância que cresceu... E mudou.

altTitles.ja-ro: Heroine? Seijo? Iie, All Works Maid desu (ko)! @COMIC

altTitles.en: Heroine? Saint? No, I'm the "Almighty Maid" (Pride)!

description.en:
“I’ll become the greatest maid in the world!”

With her black-and-white skirt fluttering in the wind, a girl declares her vow. Her name is Melody. The girl, a reincarnator of Japanese origin, inherited the dream of her past life and began working as the maid of a ruined count household in the Kingdom of Theolas. She can transform cheap black tea into a top-shelf drink as easily as she can quickly upgrade a ruined estate into a newly-finished mansion. From household cleaning to serving meals, hunting game to DIY construction, just leave everything to me! Anything’s possible with the help of all-powerful magic!

Truthfully, this is actually the world of an otome game, and the superpowered, omnipotent Melody is actually the Saint… except she hasn’t realized it yet.

“Falling in love? Fighting the Demon Lord? More importantly, I’ve got chores to do!”

What will happen to a world whose savior has put her all into being a maid? How does the world cope when its grand script is discarded in favor of menial labor?

Welcome to a fantasy where a single job has upended the cogs of destiny! 
(Novel Updates)

altTitles.ja: さつきコンプレックス

description.en:
Satsuki looks totally like a girl… but is actually a boy?!  
This story is about Satsuki, his little brother Kouta, and friends.  
Full of embarassing but funny moments.

altTitles.ja: ウェディングピーチ

description.en:
During the time artist Nao Yazawa was drawing [her original Wedding Peach series](https://mangadex.org/title/13e39275-7b8b-4b70-a758-1314392e0e48/wedding-peach), she was also producing comics for the Japanese monthly magazine Shogaku Sannen-sei ("Elementary School Third Grader"). These stories, roughly paralleling the original Wedding Peach storyline, feature younger characters aimed at a younger audience.

Wedding Peach: Young Love is a collection of these often-overlooked episodes. Fans of the original series will be tickled to see their favorite characters, both hero and villain, recast in this warm and fuzzy alternate adventure.

Yazawa even throws in a few new characters for readers to fall in love with. There's the demon trio of Blitz, Cloud and Noise and a few more Jama folk, too. Together, they join Wedding Peach and her heavenly crew for one final tussle between good and evil.
___
The series was only published in volume form outside Japan, and was released as "Volume 7" of [the original series](https://mangadex.org/title/13e39275-7b8b-4b70-a758-1314392e0e48/wedding-peach) in some countries.

description.en:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.it:
Nel west americano, la gara più grande e importante del mondo sta per iniziare. Migliaia di persone sono pronte a partire da San Diego per viaggiare più di seimila chilometri incoraggiati da un premio enorme da cinquanta milioni di dollari. L'era dei cavalli sta per finire, i partecipanti allora possono usare il veicolo che preferiscono. I partecipanti devono superare situazioni estenuanti, viaggiando centinaia di chilometri al giorno passando per valli deserte inesplorate. La Steel Ball Run è unica nel suo genere.  
  
Giovane Johnny Joestar, un ex corridore di cavalli disabile, è venuto a San Diego per vedere la partenza della gara. Lì incontra Gyro Zeppelli, un corridore con due sfere d'acciaio pendenti fino alla sua vita, al posto della pistola. Johnny vede la sfera di Gyro e capisce della sua potenzialità, riuscendo a far suicidare il nemico durante un duello. Nel mezzo dell'azione, Johnny tocca la sfera d'acciaio di Gyro e sente passare una potenza nelle sue gambe, questa potenza lo fa alzare in piedi per la prima volta dopo due anni. Dopo aver giurato di capire il segreto di quelle sfere, Johnny decide di partecipare alla gara, e qui iniziano le sue bizzarre avventure per tutta l'America nella Steel Ball Run.
description.pt-br: Nos Estados Unidos, na década de 1890, um homem chamado Steven Steel decide promover a "Steel Ball Run", uma corrida corta-mato cujo trajeto atravessa todo o país. A corrida é um grande atrativo mundial que chama a atenção tanto de corredores americanos como de corredores estrangeiros. Entre esses corredores estão Johnny Joestar, um ex-jóquei americano, e Gyro Zeppeli, um estrangeiro que carrega consigo misteriosas esferas de aço. Johnny e Gyro se esbarram e dão início à história da sétima parte de JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

altTitles.ja: 日常

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

altTitles.ja: 東京ネオンスキャンダル

description.en:
The magazine contains people "secrets".

Hayama, a new employee is assigned to the weekly scandal editorial department.

It is a weekly photo magazine that publishes extreme stories about everything, from celebrity infidelity to behind-the-scenes crimes, and is derided as "trash" by some people.

As soon as he is assigned to the magazine, Hayama is paired up with a female photographer and heads for Roppongi without knowing why.

What awaits him there is a ridiculous secret junkie who masturbates to the repercussions of her scoops…….
___
[Alt Official Raw (COMIC DAYS)](https://comic-days.com/episode/14079602755480230489)
description.pt-br: Yuu Hayama é um garoto que sempre sonhou em ser um super herói, e tenta conseguir um emprego que seja de acordo com seu sonho, porém, a revista que ele consegue começar a trabalhar não é nada como ele esperava. E tudo se torna pior quando ele conhece a sensual e perigosa, Kurobane Sayuri, também chamada de "O Ás da Câmera". As experiências que ele irá passar ao lado dela, farão que seu senso de justiça aos poucos seja modificado...

description.ru:
Фантастическая приключенческая комедия с участием Карлы, тёмной эльфийки-клирика, которая слишком много вложила в навыки грубости, и Элвина, мечника, вынужденного мириться с ней.

---

description.en:
Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?  
  
Hunting erotic commentary enthusiastically!
description.ja: へっぽこ武道家、つんけん白魔、ものぐさ黒魔、酔いどれ戦士、４人の新米ガード達は街の平和を守るため、魔物に立ち向かうが、ことごとく凌辱を受けることに…
description.es-la: Las cuatro guardias novatas -una artista marcial cabeza hueca, un demonio blanco pellizcado, un demonio negro perezoso y una guerrera borracha- se enfrentan a los demonios para proteger la paz de la ciudad, pero son humilladas a cada paso...

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

altTitles.en: The Blood Star Damned by Heaven

altTitles.pt-br: A Estrela de Sangue Amaldiçoada pelo Céu

description.en: Cheon Yoo-ok is a young orphan who survives by begging, however, as he delves deeper into the mysteries of a sect, dark secrets and unknown threats begin to emerge, in a world where intrigues and conspiracies are everywhere, he will have You have to overcome unimaginable challenges to protect those you love and discover your true destiny.
description.pt-br: Cheon Yoo-ok é um jovem órfão que sobrevive pedindo esmolas, porém, à medida que ele se aprofunda nos mistérios de uma seita, segredos sombrios e ameaças desconhecidas começam a surgir, em um mundo onde intrigas e conspirações estão por toda parte, ele terá que superar desafios inimagináveis para proteger aqueles que ama e descobrir seu verdadeiro destino.

altTitles.en: An Angel Flew Down to Me!

altTitles.ja: 私に天使が舞い降りた!

description.en: The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja: スパイ ファミリー

description.ar: أمضى الجاسوس الخبير المسمى <الشفق> أيامه في مهام سرية ، وكل ذلك من أجل تحقيق عالم أفضل. لكن في يوم من الأيام ، حصل على أمر جديد صعب للغاية من القيادة. من أجل مهمته ، يجب عليه تكوين أسرة مؤقتة وبدء حياة جديدة؟!
description.en:
The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?! 

A Spy/Action/Comedy manga about a one-of-a-kind family!
description.es: El hábil espía Tasogare se dedicaba diariamente a cumplir misiones especiales por un mundo mejor. Un día recibe un complicado desafío... Su deber es crear una familia falsa y comenzar una nueva vida para poder cumplir la misión, ¿¡pero...!? ¡¡Un Espía × Acción × Comedia de una familia peculiarl!!
description.id: “Twilight,” seorang mata-mata yang hebat, setiap hari menjalankan misi rahasia untuk menciptakan dunia yang lebih baik. Suatu hari, dia mendapatkan perintah baru yang sangat sulit. Demi misi itu, dia harus memiliki keluarga sementara dan memulai hidup baru sebagai seorang ayah! Mata-mata x Aksi x Komedi keluarga istimewa!
description.it: Twilight, una delle migliori spie al mondo, ha trascorso la vita ad affrontare missioni sotto copertura per rendere il mondo un posto migliore. Un giorno però riceve un compito particolarmente difficile: dovrà formare una famiglia temporanea e iniziare una nuova vita!
description.kk: Мастер тыңшының кодтық аты<Twilight> өмірін жақсырақ әлем туралы арман үшін жасырын миссияларда өткізді. Бірақ бір күні ол командадан ерекше қиын жаңа бұйрық алады. Миссиясы үшін ол уақытша отбасын құрып, жаңа өмір бастауы керек пе?! Бірегей отбасы туралы тыңшылық/экшн/комедия!
description.pl:
Wyśmienity szpieg, Zmierzch, poświęcił się wykonywaniu tajnych misji z powodu marzeń o lepszym świecie. Ale pewnego dnia otrzymuje bardzo trudne do wykonania zadanie. Aby osiągnąć cel misji, musi założyć tymczasową rodzinę i prowadzić życie najzwyczajniejszego w świecie ojca!  
Oto opowieść o jedynej w swoim rodzaju rodzinie!
description.ru:
Мастерский шпион с кодовым именем <Сумрак> проводит свои дни в закулисных миссиях, всё ради мечты о лучшем мире. Но однажды он получает особенно сложное новое указание от командования. Для этой миссии он обязательно должен завести фиктивную семью и начать новую жизнь! Шпионская экшен-комедия об единственной в своём роде семье!

---
Хитроумный шпион по прозвищу «Сумрак» изо дня в день выполнял секретные миссии, чтобы сделать мир лучше. Однажды он получил очередное трудное задание — ради миссии ему предстоит… обзавестись временной семьёй и начать новую жизнь?! Вас ждёт яркая смесь из шпионского боевика и необычной семейной комедии!
description.th: สุดยอดสปาย "สนธยา" ได้ปฏิบัติการสอดแนมทุกๆวันเพื่อโลกที่ดีกว่า แต่แล้ววันนึงเขาก็ได้รับภารกิจสุดหิน... เพื่อการนั้นเขาจึงได้สร้างครอบครัวปลอมๆและเริ่มชีวิตใหม่!? สปาย x แอคชั่น x คอเมดี้ครอบครัวสุดแนว!
description.uk:
Холоднокровний і геніальний шпигун з кодовим ім'ям «Сутінь» завжди виконував свою роботу чітко і без зайвого шуму. Свою професію він обрав, плекаючи мрії про кращий світ. Він звик до надзвичайно складних завдань, важливість яких мала найвищий рівень, виконуючи які, він наражав своє життя на небезпеку. Але цього разу… Йому була надіслана інформація про нову місію, для успішного виконання якої «Сутінь» повинен завести сім'ю та вдавати відповідального та люблячого батька на ім'я Лоід Фолджер. Так він «удочирив» дівчинку на ім'я Аня. Дівчинка відразу входить у роль «дочки» і радіє кожній миті, яку проводить з новим «батьком». Тепер є тато та донька, але, як же мама? Нею стане неповторна наймана вбивця на ім'я Юрі Бріар (позивний - "Принцеса шипів"). 
Манґа розкриє всі тонкощі та незвичайний життєвий шлях нової «сім'ї», в якій кожен легко може виконати найскладніше завдання, або усунути ціль, але чи зможуть вони виконувати ролі «мами», «тата» та «доньки»?
description.pt-br:
O brilhante espião "Twilight" se dedicava diariamente a cumprir missões secretas por um mundo melhor. Porém, um dia, ele recebeu uma nova tarefa bastante complicada... Para cumprir a sua missão, ele deve formar uma família temporária e começar uma nova vida, mas...?! Uma história de Espiões × Ação × Comédia de uma família bem peculiar!

[ 1° TEMP.(parte 1 e 2) DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 38. ]
description.zh-hk: 技藝高超的間諜<黃昏>，為了更加美好的世界,每天從事著諜報任務。有一天，司令下達了新的難題——…。為了完成任務，所臨時組建的家庭，所展開的新生活，但是！？間諜×打鬥×與眾不同的家族喜劇現在開始！！

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.ja: ヨメガキッす

description.en:
Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
description.ja: クソ真面目で融通が利かない男子高校生・鈴紀光太郎は生意気な後輩ギャル・百舌そら子と犬猿の仲。そんな二人には秘密が…それは二人が許嫁関係で同棲していること!? 資産家の家族を持つそら子と結婚をする条件で、光太郎は潰れる寸前の父の会社を買収してもらっていたのだ!! あの手この手（エッ●なこと）で責めるメスガキそら子にたいし、光太郎は彼女を屈服させ、無事に結婚をすることができるのか――!!?

title.en: Kirby of the Stars: Pupupu Hero

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ プププヒーロー

description.en:
Kirby, the gourmand who will suck up anything, has come to the peaceful land of Pupupu!
"Pleased to eat you! I'm Kirby!"

The slapstick and lively days are about to begin, involving Chilly, who has come to live with Kirby!

title.en: Kimi no Risou no Maid ni Naru

altTitles.ja: キミの理想のメイドになる！

description.en:
To return her master's kindness, her goal is to become the ideal maid.

A classic romantic comedy of love with perfect sugar content begins!

A few months into his high school life, Renya Nijou has no friends or girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day, he witnesses how Maya Kamishiro, the most beautiful girl in his class, was about to be kidnapped by mysterious men dressed in black, apparently Maya was sold by her parents to pay their debts, so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he got through investments, but Maya can't help but want to return the favor, and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem

altTitles.es-la: Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe.

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.ja: 水のともだちカッパーマン

description.en: Kawataro, half human, half kappa, lives as a human, because his father, a kappa, wished so. Kawataro travels to find his mother who disappeared when he was young. On his trip, he encounters various youkai.

altTitles.ja: 先輩はおとこのこ

altTitles.th: รุ่นพี่สุดสวยคนนี้เป็นผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja: ぱいのこ
先輩はおとこのこ～出会い編～

altTitles.en: Senpai is an Otokonoko: The Encounter

altTitles.zh-hk: 前輩是偽娘 邂逅篇

altTitles.zh: 前辈是男孩子 邂逅篇

altTitles.en: Senpai Is an Otokonoko: My Crossdressing Classmate

description.de: Die Highschool-Schülerin Aoi ist schwer verliebt in Makoto, ein superhübsches Mädchen, die die gleiche Schule besucht. Aber als Aoi ihren Mut zusammennimmt, Makoto ihre Liebe zu gestehen, nimmt die Geschichte plötzlich eine unerwartete Wendung: In Wirklichkeit ist Makato ein Junge, der sich als Mädchen verkleidet!
description.en:
The story of a crossdresser who receives a confession from a junior.

---

**Official Translations:**

description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！

altTitles.en: Only I Farm in the Dungeon
I'm the Only One Farming in the Dungeon

description.en: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
description.it: Un giorno, una misteriosa torre apparve improvvisamente in città. La gente decise di chiamarla dungeon, e sebbene fosse pieno di asperità e mostri pericolosi, era anche una terra di opportunità, dove erano in attesa innumerevoli tesori. Quando Sejun, un giovane che vive una vita normale, viene invitato per caso nel dungeon sotterraneo, è entusiasta all'idea di diventare ricco, ma è rimasto bloccato in una zona nascosta della torre misteriosa. Tutto quello che ha sono alcuni semi e il suo corpo. Ora Sejun deve coltivare, raccogliere risorse e capire come sopravvivere!

altTitles.pt-br: A reviravolta que mudou minha vida

description.en:
"Did I hit a man?"
With a mayor father, and one foot in Hankuk University, high school student Jo Soo-Ah is living the high life. One mistake leads to a hit-and-run. "It's okay because no one saw it", she thinks. But her life is slowly cracking down when the messages of M, an eyewitness who seemed to know everything, flying towards her.
description.pt-br: "Eu atropelei alguém?" O pai é um empresário proeminente, formado na Universidade da Coreia! Jo Soo-Ah, uma estudante do ensino médio com currículo exemplar! Com apenas um erro, ela se envolve em um acidente de atropelamento. Mas está tudo bem. Ninguém viu. No entanto, uma mensagem de M. chega até ela, perguntando: "?" "Quem é você?" "!" Uma testemunha. A aparição de uma testemunha que sabe de tudo. A perfeição de sua vida cotidiana começa a desmoronar!

description.en: Side story to the High Card anime, which is due to premier in the Winter 2023 season, and part of the High Card multimedia project.
description.ja:
その「カード」が、運命を変える──。

オリジナルTVアニメーション「HIGH CARD」の先行コミカライズ。
平凡な学生のパーシー・パーカーは、一枚のカードを手に入れたことで不思議な連中に目をつけられる…。
アニメ原案の河本ほむらが原作を、アニメキャラクター原案のえびもが作画を手掛けるスタイリッシュ・アクション！

description.en: A gloomy boy suddenly getting close with the popular track and field club ace?! A short comedy about invading someone else's spot to skip class is about to begin!!
description.pt-br: Um rapaz sombrio de repente se aproximando do popular ás do clube de atletismo?! Uma comédia curta sobre invadir o espaço de outra pessoa para escapar das aulas está prestes a começar!!

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

description.en: Rakugo: A traditional form of Japanese storytelling, told orally by one sitting down. Often humorous, often filled with folly, rakugo has persisted throughout the ages with good reason. Within *Masterpiece Rakugo Complete Works*, 33 rakugo stories are closely adapted by George Akiyama, who gives them his own charming, chaotic touch.

altTitles.ru: Иона: Девушка, стоящая в лучах рассвета

altTitles.ja: 暁のヨナ

altTitles.en: Yona: The Girl Standing in the Blush of Dawn

altTitles.th: กู้บัลลังก์มังกรแดง

description.en:
Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka, living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics, the most divine sweets, a loving emperor as a father, and the hottest cousin crush, Soo-won, any girl could ever hope to have. Now, if only her bodyguard, Son Hak, weren't so annoying towards her, and if her hair weren't so red…  
But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves, Soo-won, murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona, and they lead a life on the run from that point on.  
  


---
description.id: Dahulu kala, 2.000 tahun yang lalu Kerajaan Kouka didirikan dan diperintah oleh seekor naga merah yang turun ke Bumi dari Surga berubah menjadi manusia dengan nama Hiryuu. Di sisinya, empat prajurit yang dijiwai dengan darah naga dari para Dewa yang membantunya memimpin kerajaan menuju kemakmuran. Waktu berlalu, dan kisah ini menjadi legenda untuk diceritakan kepada anak-anak. 2.000 tahun kemudian, kerajaan tidak memiliki ahli waris laki-laki kecuali seorang putri tunggal bernama Yona yang hidup dalam kemewahan. Jatuh cinta dengan sepupunya, Soo-Won , dan dilindungi oleh pengawalnya, Son Hak , dia memiliki semua yang dia inginkan dan terlindung dari kenyataan mengerikan di luar tembok kastil. Bertentangan dengan ilusi damai ini, Kouka mengalami pergolakan politik dari dalam kerajaan. Setelah Su-won yang dicintainya melakukan kudeta berdarah dan membunuh ayahnya, Yona terpaksa melarikan diri hanya dengan Hak di sisinya dan mulai menjalani kehidupan dalam pelarian. Meskipun dikelilingi oleh musuh di semua sisi, putri yang dibuang itu masih ingin menyelamatkan kerajaannya. Solusinya datang dari seorang pendeta yang diasingkan, yang mengatakan kepadanya bahwa satu-satunya harapannya adalah menemukan empat prajurit naga legendaris. Dipandu oleh mitos yang tampaknya fiktif ini, Yona berangkat untuk menemukan para pejuang ini, bertekad untuk memperjuangkan tahta, dan memulihkan kerajaan sambil menjalin pertemanan dan sekutu baru di sepanjang jalan.
description.ru:
Йона — единственная принцесса королевства Коука. Она ведет роскошную и беззаботную жизнь, как и подобает принцессам. У неё есть всё: лучшая одежда и косметика, превосходные сладости, любящий отец Император Иль, и сильнейшие чувства к кузену Су Вону, о котором многие могли лишь мечтать. Вот только если бы её телохранитель Сон Хак не так раздражал и её волосы не были такими красными.   
Все меняется в ночь на шестнадцатый день рождения девушки. Почти идеальный мир быстро рассыпается, когда человек, которого она любит — Су Вон — убил её отца. Путь к его становлению на престол ныне гарантирован. Вместе с Хаком, Йона скрылась из замка в поисках помощи, и с этого момента они ведут жизнь в бегах…
description.pt-br: Yona, única princesa do reino, era apaixonada pelo seu primo e tinha uma vida luxuosamente despreocupada, como toda princesa. Mas tudo muda depois de uma traição que a obriga a fugir do castelo com seu guarda-costas, Son Hak. Nisso, eles descobrem sobre uma lenda que mudará totalmente o destino deles.

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.

altTitles.ja: リコリス・リコイル

description.en: Takina Inoue, a high school girl working as a member of an all-female taskforce of assassins and spies known as "Lycoris" dispatched to eliminate criminals and terrorists in Tokyo, is sanctioned by her superiors at the DA agency for disobeying orders in order to save a colleague. She is transferred to work with the elite Lycoris agent Chisato Nishikigi at one of the agency's branches, which operates under the cover of a cafe, called "LycoReco".
description.ja: 凶悪犯罪が一切起こらない国・日本。その治安を陰から維持するエージェント「リコリス」の正体は、制服に身を包み、都市に紛れる少女たちであった――。

description.pt-br:
De pais casados ​​à força, cuja única paixão compartilhada é o desdém mútuo, nasce uma criança negligenciada – Leoni.

Ansiosa por afeto quando criança, Leoni perde a mãe para uma doença, apenas para que seu pai leiloe sua mão em casamento.

Suportando três casamentos arranjados, Leoni enfrenta mais dificuldades quando é falsamente acusada de um crime capital, aparentemente destinado a um amargo fim.

“Aqueles que orquestraram minha miséria… Cada um deles… pagará…!”

Talvez por força de vontade, Leoni se encontra de volta à infância, com memórias intactas – e sua ira.

Agora, ela deve recuperar sua vida e buscar a tão esperada felicidade. Mas primeiro há dívidas de sofrimento a serem pagas. E Leoni vem cobrar.

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure.

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.

description.ar:
"الآن ، أنت الوحيد المتبقي ، سيدتي." لقد تجسدت من جديد كابنة لبارون في رواية قرأتها في حياتي السابقة. بفضل ذلك علمت أن الصبي الذي أحضره والدي ليكون عبدًا سيقتل الباروني ، وسأواجه موتًا مروّعًا ، ونهاية هذا العالم. لقد عملت بجد من أجل تجنب هذا المصير البائس ، لكن كل شيء كان هباءً. في النهاية ، على يد الشخص الذي استيقظ كالساحر الكبير مات أبي وجميع الخدم. والآن سأموت أيضًا ... هل هذا ما اعتقدته؟ "أردت أن أبقيك يا سيدتي." بدأ شرير هذا العالم يصبح مهووسًا بي. ... ولكن لم يكن هناك أي شيء مثل هذا في الأصل؟ أصبحت فاليتا التي بدأت في الابتعاد عن العمل الأصلي أقرب إلى الحقيقة المظلمة لهذا العالم. من العائلة الإمبراطورية المتورطة في الشؤون القذرة وظهور وحوش مجهولة. لقد أرادت فقط أن تعيش بحرية ولكن في وضع تحتاج فيه إلى إنقاذ العالم أولاً! هل ستتمكن فاليتا من العثور على الحياة التي تريدها؟

description.en:
One day, my father gave me a boy slave. He said he saved him from the battlefield due to his good looks.

"He has a seal engraved on his heart. As long as you have this bead, he won't be able to disobey you. So you can order him to do anything."

The boy looked rather grim after hearing what he was I ordered. Ah, was I treating him too much like a dog? As my father squeezed the bead, the boy then knelt at my feet.

"Master," his red eyes flashed, illuminating his eerie gaze while smiling madly.

Why is he like this to me?! I tried my best to treat him properly!

---
Reborn as the daughter of a count she read about in a novel, Lady Valeta knows the story ends in tragedy at the hands of her lowly house pet, Reinhart. Having never wanted him in the first place, Valeta tries but fails to oust him from her house. But when Reinhart's powerful magic is awakened one day, he kills all those around her, and it is now Valeta who is at his mercy. Though the tables have turned, Reinhart can't shake his attachment for Valeta. He lets her live, but only within his grasp.

description.fr:
Un jour, mon père m’a donné un garçon esclave. Il a dit qu’il l’avait sauvé du champ de bataille grâce à sa bonne mine. « Il a un sceau gravé sur son coeur. Tant que tu as cette perle, il ne pourra pas te désobéir. Donc vous pouvez lui ordonner de faire n’importe quoi. » Le garçon avait l’air plutôt sinistre après avoir entendu ce que je lui ordonnais. Ah, est-ce que je le traitais trop comme un chien ? Alors que mon père pressait la perle, le garçon s’est agenouillé à mes pieds. « Maître » Ses yeux rouges ont clignoté, illuminant son regard sinistre tout en souriant follement. Pourquoi est-il comme ça avec moi ? ! J’ai fait de mon mieux pour le traiter correctement !

description.id:
Terlahir sebagai putri dari Count dalam novel yang dibacanya, Valleta tahu cerita ini berakhir dengan insiden atas ulah budaknya, Reinhart. Valleta yang tidak pernah menginginkan dirinya sejak awal, berusaha keras mengusirnya tapi gagal. Suatu hari saat kekuatan sihir Reinhart bangkit, dia membunuh semua orang, dan sekarang Valleta yang berada dalam belas kasihannya. Meskipun situasi sudah berbalik, Reinhart tidak mampu membunuh Valleta. Dia membiarkan wanita itu hidup, tapi dalam pengawasannya.

description.ko:
"자, 이제 너만 남았네. 주인님."

전생에 읽었던 소설 속 백작 영애로 환생했다. 

덕분에 아버지가 내 노예라고 데려온 한 소년에 의해 백작 가문이 몰살당하는 것도,
내가 끔찍한 죽음을 맞이한다는 것도,
이 세계의 결말도 알 수 있었다. 

그 비참한 운명을 피하기 위해 노력했지만 모두 헛수고였다. 
결국 대마법사로 각성한 그의 손에 아버지와 시종들은 모두 죽었다. 
이제 나도 죽.....을줄 알았는데?

"난 주인님이 가지고 싶었거든."

이 세계의 흑막이 나에게 집착하기 시작한다. 

.....이런 건 원작에 없었는데?

원작에서 벗어난 발레타는 조금씩 이 세계의 어두운 진실에 가까워져간다.
더러운 수작질을 벌이고 있었던 황실부터, 정체를 알 수 없는 마물들의 등장까지.

자유롭게 살고 싶었을 뿐인데 세상부터 먼저 구해야하는 상황!
과연 발레타는 원하는 삶을 찾을 수 있을까?

description.uk:
Одного дня мій батько подарував мені прислугу. Він сказав, що врятував його, забравши з поля бою, через гарну зовнішність. «На його серці вирізьблена печатка. Поки ти матимеш цей кулон, він не зможе протистояти тобі. Отже, ти можеш наказати йому зробити все, що завгодно.». Почувши, що його воля в моїх руках, хлопець нахмурився.
«Ох, я занадто перебільшую, поводячись із тобою — наче із собакою?», — у цей момент батько стиснув у кулак цю намистину, і хлопець упав на коліна перед моїми ногами.
«Панно…, — його червоні очі блиснули, розкриваючи весь моторошний погляд, а губи розходилися в божевільній посмішці: — Чому він так ставиться до мене?! Я ж так намагався догодити йому!»

title.en: Ofu-kai Shitara Tondemonai Yatsu ga Kita Hanashi

altTitles.ja: オフ会したらとんでもないやつが来た話

altTitles.en: A Story About an Offline Meet-up Between an Otaku and a Yakuza

description.en:
Miki Megumi is a loner and a closet otaku who's pretty devoted to her fan activities! She wants a friend who she can gush over her bias with... And when she went for an offline meeting with a follower from social media, they turned out to be a bona fide yakuza!!! Despite feeling like her life is in danger, after talking with him, she could tell that he's a truly passionate otaku!

He's overly sensitive, and any talk about shipping the reverse of his faves are a taboo. Plus, he turned out to be the troublemaker that his appearance suggests but being with him is fun and he's also dependable!!
description.ja: 三木めぐみはボッチでオタク活動に勤しむ隠れオタ! 推しについて語り合える友達が欲しい...と、SNSのフォロワーとオフ会をしてみたら、やってきたのはゴリゴリのヤクザ!!! 命の危険を感じつつも話をしてみると、やっぱり熱心なオタクだった! 繊細すぎるし逆カプが地雷だったりと見た目通りかなりの厄介者だけど、一緒にいると楽しいし頼もしい!!
